name: Bart's Adventure
description:
Developer's Note

This game has been created in the span of four months and I am very pround to present it as the first game ever made entirely by me, myself and I. Nonetheless it is a newbie project and you are very welcome to report bugs or share contructive critisism so I can improve my work in the future. I hope you have plenty fun with it!

Credits:

Created with: Unity

Visuals made with: Aseprite

Sound resources: EpidemicSound & Freesound
